content:
Incident ID: INC-1003
Title: Kafka Consumer Lag Spike
Description: Consumers were unable to process messages in real time.
Symptoms: Consumer lag > 50000 messages, CPU at 95%, slow processing.
Root Cause: Insufficient consumer replicas under heavy load.
Resolution: Increased replicas from 3 to 8 and rebalanced partitions.
Prevention: Implement auto-scaling based on consumer lag.
